sources.title: Racket Busters
sources.description: Title: Racket Busters Summary: Manhattan gangster John "Czar" Martin enters the trucking business in an effort to control the produce market. When he catches popular trucker Danny Jordan robbing the gang's office to ... Directed by: Lloyd Bacon Actors: Humphrey Bogart, George Brent, Gloria Dickson Production Company: Warner Bros. Release Date: 16 July 1938 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Manhattan gangster John "Czar" Martin enters the trucking business in an effort to control the produce market. When he catches popular trucker Danny Jordan robbing the gang's office to provide for his pregnant wife Nora, Martin forces Jordan to join him. As the other truckers come around Martin appears to have won.

metadata.Plot: Manhattan gangster John "Czar" Martin enters the trucking business in an effort to control the produce market. When he catches popular trucker Danny Jordan robbing the gang's office to provide for his pregnant wife Nora, Martin forces Jordan to join him. As the other truckers come around Martin appears to have won.
metadata.Writer: Robert Rossen, Leonardo Bercovici, Warren Duff
metadata.Actors: Humphrey Bogart, George Brent, Gloria Dickson
